titleStmt.title: Europes revels for the peace and His Majesties happy return a musical interlude : with a panegyrical poem spoken there on the same occasion / written by Mr. Motteux.
Europe's revels for the peace. Libretto
titleStmt.author: Eccles, John, d. 1735.
Motteux, Peter Anthony, 1660-1718.

notesStmt.note: "Set to music by Mr. John Eccles"--p. [1]
"Performed at the theatre in Little Lincolns-Inn-Fields by His Majesties servants."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
